description: This clean, trim fit, 5-pocket silhouette has a reflective inseam cuff for exrtra visibility and a secure zip pocket sized to fit your phone. As always, Ferrosi is the perfect softshell for lightweight, durable, stretchy, UPF 50+ weather resistance in an ideal spring and summer weight for climbing, hiking, and multi-sport days. Plus, and eco-friendly fabric that's 46% recycled nylan with improved stretch and recovery for multi-day use.
name: Outdoor Research Ferrosi Transit Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: 46% Recycled Nylon, 40% Nylon, 14% Spandex - Bluesign® approved
